articles.title: Elisa Oyj Invests in Cloud-Native Infrastructure
articles.summary: In a strategic move to enhance operational efficiency, Elisa Oyj is migrating key business systems to cloud-native platforms. The transformation is expected to reduce costs and improve scalability.

articles.title: Elisa Oyj Reports Strong Financial Performance
articles.summary: Elisa Oyj has reported solid financial results for the quarter, with revenue growth driven by strong performance in core business areas. The company reaffirmed its commitment to investing in technology and innovation.

articles.title: Elisa Oyj Expands Operations in Nordic Region
articles.summary: Elisa Oyj is expanding its operational footprint in Nordic Region with new facilities and increased investment. The expansion supports the company's growth strategy and commitment to the region.
